title: Daily Health Summary Reports for Caregivers
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to receive daily health summary reports so that my family can stay informed about my well-being without feeling monitored.

title: Medication Management Support – Automated Reminders for Medication Schedules
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to receive automated reminders for my medication schedules so that I can maintain my health without feeling monitored.

title: Health Data Sharing with Caregivers
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to securely share my health data with my family members so that they can help me monitor my health without feeling intrusive.

title: Personalized Care Plan Development
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want a personalized care plan that tracks my health goals and achievements, so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities and stay active without feeling monitored.

title: Emergency Health Response Coordination – Voice Activation for Emergency Assistance Requests
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to be able to request emergency assistance through voice commands so that I can feel secure and maintain my independence without the feeling of being constantly monitored.

title: Tailored Exercise Reminders
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want personalized reminders for physical exercises tailored to my capabilities so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities and continue my active lifestyle without feeling monitored.

title: Cognitive Health Enhancement Tools – Daily Cognitive Challenges with Adaptive Difficulty
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want engaging cognitive stimulation games that adapt to my skill level, so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities while feeling empowered and not monitored.

title: Adaptive Interface Adjustments for Cognitive Support
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want the interface to adapt based on my usage patterns so that I can easily access cognitive stimulation games and reminders without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.
